statements: DELETE FROM audit_details WHERE new_value IS NULL;
DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE log_id = 100 AND username = 'admin';
DELETE FROM audit_details WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE id = 1 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM data_changes WHERE change_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_changes WHERE table_name = 'users' AND timestamp < '2021-01-01'
